name: player
content:
player noun [C]
(GAME)
Add to word list
Add to word list
A1 someone who takes part in a game or sport: Each player takes three cards. The team has many talented players.
someone who is very involved in an activity or organization: She was a leading/key player in the reorganization of the health service.
More examplesFewer examplesHe's currently the best defensive player on the team.That was an impressive performance from such a young tennis player.A good snooker player takes time deciding which shot to play.She's the youngest player ever to get through to a semifinal.Some very high-profile British players have transferred to clubs abroad.
